content: The link in the snapshot tab of the snapshot build of au-pd-healthcareservice (http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-pd/StructureDefinition-au-pd-healthcareservice.html) to the SNOMED specialty value set (http://hl7.org.au/fhir/ValueSet/snomed-healthcareservice-services) is currently broken. We agreed in the WG that the March 2018 link in this space was not to be used. Is it correct that the value set used in the December Connectathon build (http://hl7.org.au/fhir/pd2017Dec/ValueSet-valueset-snomed-healthcareservice-role.html) is still valid, or have there been changes to the value set?

Hi John - there are a lot of broken links in the build.fhir.org build - all of the au-fhir-base references are using http://hl7.ogr.au/fhir where should be resolving to http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base - the services terminology can be found at http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base/ValueSet-snomed-healthcareservice-services.html

this is the services hierarchy as discussed at the working group; we still have a number of publication issues preventing a clean publication https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/18-australia/topic/IG.20Publisher.20Issue.20Hit.20List but the intent is to get this corrected; then QA content for a snapshot publication of the AU Base and AU PD profiles; then be formally presented for ballot comments under HL7 AU
An ogre indeed... the link posted yesterday (which did work) is now giving me the 404 treatment... http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base/ValueSet-snomed-healthcareservice-services.html
publication server issues today at fhir.org - we are back up now
